content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I executed the file "Atlas/executed_code/hello_world.py" and it returned "Hello, world!". I then appended the text "This is a new line of text." to the file "Atlas/executed_code/my_file.txt" successfully. I replaced the text "This is a new line of text." with "This is a modified line of text." in the same file at occurrence index 0 and successfully executed the command. I read the file "Atlas/executed_code/my_file.txt" and then deleted it successfully. I listed all files in the directory "Atlas/executed_code" and executed the file "Atlas/executed_code/hello_world.py" again, which returned "Hello, world!".
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "append_to_file", "args": {"filename": "Atlas/executed_code/my_file.txt", "text": "This is a new line of text."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command append_to_file returned: Text appended successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "replace_in_file", "args": {"filename": "Atlas/executed_code/my_file.txt", "old_text": "This is a new line of text.", "new_text": "This is a modified line of text.", "occurrence_index": 0}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command replace_in_file returned: File /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/Atlas/executed_code/my_file.txt updated successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "Atlas/executed_code/my_file.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "delete_file", "args": {"filename": "Atlas/executed_code/my_file.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "Atlas/executed_code"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_file", "args": {"filename": "Atlas/executed_code/hello_world.py"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_python_file returned: Hello, world!\n', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "Atlas/executed_code/my_file.txt", "text": "This is a new line of text."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "replace_in_file", "args": {"filename": "Atlas/executed_code/my_file.txt", "old_text": "This is a new line of text.", "new_text": "This is a modified line of text.", "occurrence_index": 0}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command replace_in_file returned: File /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/Atlas/executed_code/my_file.txt updated successfully.', type='action_result')]
"""
